item.title: Docs: Ruyi: A Cloud-Native Cluster Scaling Engine
item.description:
Ruyi provides an automated and intelligent cloud-native cluster scaling engine.

Ruyi offers an automated and intelligent cloud-native cluster scaling engine, with main features including:

  • Auto-scaling: Provides auto-scaling based on Pod Requests.
  • Virtual Capacity: Employs automated and intelligent technology to elastically scale node capacity, supporting the scheduling of as many Pods as possible.
  • Multi-cloud Support: Supports AWS, Alibaba Cloud, with more cloud service providers being integrated.
  • Monitoring and Management: Offers multi-dimensional monitoring metrics data.

Ruyi provides an automated and intelligent cloud-native cluster scaling engine, with key features including:

  • Auto-scaling: Offers auto-scaling based on Pod Requests.
  • Virtual Capacity: Elastically scales node capacity using automated and intelligent technology, supporting the scheduling of as many Pods as possible.
  • Multi-cloud Support: Supports AWS, AliCloud, with more cloud service providers being integrated.
  • Monitoring and Management: Provides multi-dimensional monitoring metrics data.
